attributes.additional_details:
It's about time the price of fuel was lowered and not just for a temporary amount of time. This country make extortionate amount on fuel every year. 
Forecourts all of UK keep them ridiculously high for sheer greed and profit. 
Logical thing to do is lower the price, lower price would mean we would be able to fill tanks for less money so everyone can afford to get more fuel more often.
attributes.background: Lower the price of fuel at all UK fuel stations.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take in order to reduce fuel prices in the UK or by how much.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what policy you would like the Government or Parliament to take to reduce fuel prices, and by how much you would like prices to be reduced or capped.
